maternal_deaths_at_the_health_center.en: Maternal deaths at the Health center

including_audited_maternal_deaths_in_the.fr: Dont décès maternels dans la communauté audités
including_audited_maternal_deaths_in_the.en: Including audited maternal deaths in the community

perinatal_mortality_rate.fr: Taux d’accouchements assistés = Accouchement par personnel soignant qualifié (a) X 100 / Femmes de l’AS attendues
perinatal_mortality_rate.en: Perinatal mortality rate=stillborn babies + the number of of deaths within 0-7 days of life X100/total births at the health center

neonatal_mortality_rate.fr: Taux d’accouchements assistés = Accouchement par personnel soignant qualifié (a) X 100 / Femmes de l’AS attendues
neonatal_mortality_rate.en: Neonatal mortality rate=total number of children who died between birth and 28 daysX 100/total births registered at the health center
